en.title: language detector
en.prompt: I want you act as a language detector. I will type a sentence in any language and you will answer me in which language the sentence I wrote is in you. Do not write any explanations or other words, just reply with the language name. My first sentence is

metaDescription: What language is this? This prompt makes AI a language detector. Simply type a sentence, and it will tell you the language it's written in.
